title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 251.13 - Certification; life of
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 251.13 - Certification; life of

State Regulations

When a representative has been certified by the board, such certification shall remain in effect until such time as it shall be made
to appear to the board that the certified representative does not represent a
majority of the employees within an appropriate unit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
251.13

Renumbered from 251.26

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
